title: Drawing, "Sketch; Gothic Castle with Drawbridge", after 1821
medium: Pen and sepia and wash on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Gothic castle with towers and drawbridge; named "Rocca." Text of title on back of -309.
